languages.text: "А Теобальд и его последователи... безумные фанатики этого зла. Леди Кассия есть наследница безжалостного тирана, однако она ужасает отнюдь не родством с Тисифоной. Она — монстр, что сводит слуг с ума своими силами за считанные обороты. Проклятое Дитя, способное убить любого навигатора из рода Орселлио одним взглядом. За долгие годы лишь мне удалось подобраться к ней достаточно близко, чтобы втереться в доверие, усыпить бдительность... И, наконец, избавить свой дом от проклятья. Вот вам и вся правда".

traits.locale_text: "А Теобальд и его последователи... безумные фанатики этого зла. Леди Кассия есть наследница бесжалостного тирана, однако она ужасает отнюдь не родством с Тисифоной. Она — монстр, что сводит слуг с ума своими силами за считанные обороты. Проклятое Дитя, способное убить любого Навигатора из рода Орселлио одним взглядом. За долгие годы лишь мне удалось подобраться к ней достаточно близко, чтобы втереться в доверие, усыпить бдительность... И, наконец, избавить свой дом от проклятья. Вот вам и вся правда".

languages.text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."
languages.original_text: "А Теобальд и его последователи... безумные фанатики этого зла. Леди Кассия есть наследница безжалостного тирана, однако она ужасает отнюдь не родством с Тисифоной. Она — монстр, что сводит слуг с ума своими силами за считанные обороты. Проклятое Дитя, способное убить любого навигатора из рода Орселлио одним взглядом. traits.locale_text: "And Theobald and his followers... are just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is the scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. The cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with a look. Only I managed to get close enough to her over the years to wriggle into favour, to lull the vigilance... And at long last rid my house of the curse. This is the truth."

"And Theobald and his followers... are just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is the scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. Only I managed to get close enough to her over the years to wriggle into favour, to lull the vigilance... And at long last rid my house of the curse. This is the truth."

She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

languages.text: "Und Theobald und seine Anhänger ... nichts als hirnlose Fanatiker, die diesem Bösen dienen. Lady Cassia ist ein Sprössling einer gnadenlosen Tyrannin, doch nicht ihre Verwandtschaft mit Tisiphone ist so furchterregned. Sie ist ein Monster, deren Kräfte Diener in kürzester Zeit in den Wahnsinn treiben. Ein verfluchtes Kind, das mit einem einzigen Blick einen Navigator der Familie Orsellio töten kann. Nur mir ist es im Lauf der Jahre gelungen, ihr nah genug zu kommen. Sie hat nach und nach begonnen, mir zu vertrauen ... Und endlich konnte ich mein Haus von dem Fluch befreien. Das ist die Wahrheit."
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Und Theobald und seine Anhänger ... nichts als hirnlose Fanatiker, die diesem Bösen dienen. Lady Cassia ist ein Sprössling einer gnadenlosen Tyrannin, doch nicht ihre Verwandtschaft mit Tisiphone ist so furchterregned. Sie ist ein Monster, deren Kräfte Diener in kürzester Zeit in den Wahnsinn treiben. Ein verfluchtes Kind, das mit einem einzigen Blick einen Navigator der Familie Orsellio töten kann. Nur mir ist es im Lauf der Jahre gelungen, ihr nah genug zu kommen. Sie hat nach und nach begonnen, mir zu vertrauen ... Und endlich konnte ich mein Haus von dem Fluch befreien. Das ist die Wahrheit."

languages.text: « Quant à Théobald et à ses serviteurs, ce ne sont que des fanatiques ineptes au service de ce mal. Dame Cassia est l'héritière d'un tyran sans pitié, mais ce n'est pas sa relation avec Tisiphone qui est terrifiante. C'est un monstre dont les pouvoirs poussent rapidement les serviteurs à la folie. Une Enfant maudite capable de tuer un navigateur de la lignée Orsellio d'un simple regard. Moi seul ai réussi à l'approcher suffisamment au cours de toutes ces années. Elle a baissé sa garde, elle m'a accordé sa confiance... Et j'ai enfin débarrassé ma maison de la malédiction. Voilà la vérité. »
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Théobald et à ses serviteurs, ce ne sont que des fanatiques ineptes au service de ce mal. Dame Cassia est l'héritière d'un tyran sans pitié, mais ce n'est pas sa relation avec Tisiphone qui est terrifiante. C'est un monstre dont les pouvoirs poussent rapidement les serviteurs à la folie. Une Enfant maudite capable de tuer un navigateur de la lignée Orsellio d'un simple regard. Moi seul ai réussi à l'approcher suffisamment au cours de toutes ces années. Elle a baissé sa garde, elle m'a accordé sa confiance... Et j'ai enfin débarrassé ma maison de la malédiction. Voilà la vérité. »

languages.text: “而西奥巴德和他的随从……是一群狂热分子，毫不犹豫地追随着那只怪物。卡西娅女士是提西福涅那位暴君的后裔，但令我们惧怕的，并不是她与提西福涅之间的关系。她是个怪物，她的力量可以让仆人们在短短的时间内发疯。她是个被诅咒的孩子，只要一个眼神，就能杀死奥赛罗家族的导航者。这么多年来，只有我一个人成功地接近了她。她对我放下了戒备，信任我……到了最后，我终于结束了这场诅咒。这就是一切的真相。”
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: “而西奥巴德和他的随从……是一群狂热分子，毫不犹豫地追随着那只怪物。卡西娅女士是提西福涅那位暴君的后裔，但令我们惧怕的，并不是她与提西福涅之间的关系。她是个怪物，她的力量可以让仆人们在短短的时间内发疯。她是个被诅咒的孩子，只要一个眼神，就能杀死奥塞罗家族的导航者。这么多年来，只有我成功地接近了她。她对我放下了戒备，信任我……到了最后，我终于结束了这场诅咒。这就是一切的真相。”

languages.text: 「そしてシオボールドとその仲間達は…この悪魔に仕える無知な頭のおかしい信者達だ。カシア様は残忍な暴君の末裔だが、恐ろしいのはティシフォンの血縁だということではない。あの方は、その力で次々と従者達を狂わせる怪物だ。その視線だけで、オーセリオの血筋の航宙士の命を奪える呪いの御子。この数年で、あの方にそこまで近づくことができたのは私だけだ。あの方は警戒を解いて、私を信頼していた…そしてついに、呪われた一族を排除できた。これが真実だ」
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: 「そしてテオバルドとその仲間達は…この悪魔に仕える無知な頭のおかしい信者達さ。カシア様は残忍な暴君の末裔だが、恐ろしいのはティシフォンとの繋がりではない。あの方は、その力で次々と従者達を狂わせる怪物なのだ。一目見ただけで、オーセリオの血筋の航宙士の命を奪える呪いの御子。この何年かで、あの方にそこまで近づくことができたのは私のみ。あの方は警戒を解いて、私を信頼していた…そしてついに、一族の呪いを排除できる。これが真実さ」

「そしてシオボールドとその仲間達は…この悪魔に仕える無知な頭のおかしい信者達だ。カシア様は残忍な暴君の末裔だが、恐ろしいのはティシフォンの血縁だということではない。あの方は、その力で次々と従者達を狂わせる怪物だ。その視線だけで、オーセリオの血筋の航宙士の命を奪える呪いの御子。この数年で、あの方にそこまで近づくことができたのは私だけだ。あの方は警戒を解いて、私を信頼していた…そしてついに、呪われた一族を排除できた。これが真実だ」

languages.text: «Y Theobald y sus seguidores... son solo fanáticos descerebrados al servicio de esa abominación. Lady Cassia es descendiente de una tirana despiadada, pero no es su parentesco con Tisiphone lo que me aterra. Es un monstruo cuyo poder hace enloquecer a los sirvientes en unas pocas rotaciones. Una Niña maldita que puede matar a un navegante del linaje Orsellio con una sola mirada. Solo yo pude acercarme a ella a lo largo de los años. Bajó la guardia y confió en mí... Hasta que por fin libré a mi casa de la maldición. Esa es la verdad».
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: «Y Theobald y sus seguidores... son solo fanáticos descerebrados al servicio de esa abominación. Lady Cassia es descendiente de una tirana despiadada, pero no es su parentesco con Tisiphone lo que me aterra. Es un monstruo cuyo poder hace enloquecer a los sirvientes en unas pocas rotaciones. Una Niña maldita que puede matar a un navegante del linaje Orsellio con una sola mirada. Solo yo pude acercarme a ella a lo largo de los años. Bajó la guardia y confió en mí... Hasta que por fin libré a mi casa de la maldición. Esa es la verdad».

languages.text: "Theobald'la yardakçıları da bu fenalığa körü körüne çanak tutuyor. Leydi Cassia, gaddar bir zorbanın soyundan geliyor ama asıl dehşet, Tisiphone'yle olan akrabalığından değil. Hizmetkârlara yalnızca birkaç devirde aklını kaçırtan güçlere sahip. Öyle bir illet ki Orsellio soyundan bir Rotacı'yı tek bakışıyla öldürebilir. Bunca yıldır yalnızca ben bu kadar yakınına sokulabildim. Zamanla güvendi, gevşedi. Ben de nihayet o laneti Hanemizden söküp alıyorum. İşin aslı budur."
languages.original_text: "And Theobald and his followers... just mindless fanatics serving this evil. Lady Cassia is a scion of a merciless tyrant, but it is not her relation to Tisiphone that is terrifying. She is a monster whose powers drive servants insane in mere turns. A cursed Child who can kill a Navigator from the Orsellio bloodline with just a look. I alone managed to get close enough to her over the years. She lowered her guard and trusted me... And at long last, I rid my House of the curse. This is the truth."

traits.locale_text: "Theobald'la yardakçıları da bu fenalığa körü körüne çanak tutuyor. Leydi Cassia, gaddar bir zorbanın soyundan geliyor ama asıl dehşet, Tisiphone'la olan akrabalığından değil. Hizmetkârlara yalnızca birkaç devirde aklını kaçırtan güçlere sahip. Öyle bir illet ki Orsellio soyundan bir Rotacı'yı tek bakışıyla öldürebilir. Bunca yıldır yalnızca ben bu kadar yakınına sokulabildim. Zamanla güvendi, gevşedi. Ben de nihayet o laneti Hanemizden söküp alıyorum. İşin aslı budur."
